title: Cancer: the problem of early diagnosis (D)
creator_credit: American Cancer Society and Audio Productions
brief_description: An educational documentary looking at the disease - cancer. This film addresses the carious forms of cancer - gastric, breast, cervix, lung etc - and explains the symptoms involved with each. Employs diagrams and actual surgery footage to assist in explaining the disease. Aims to convey the message that early diagnosis and treatment is often the best prevention of cancer. Contains graphic footage of surgery.
